comment._content: Commonwealth Wr Graves Commission lists the following details NICHOLSON, HUGH Rank:Rifleman Service No:15711 Date of Death:01/07/1916 Regiment/Service:Royal Irish Rifles 10th Bn. Panel ReferencePier and Face 15 A and 15 B. MemorialTHIEPVAL MEMORIAL this information can be found here www.cwgc.org/search-for-war-dead/casualty/806328/NICHOLSO...

comment.author: 77235581@N00
comment._content: Hugh Nicholson was born at Dundonald, Co Antrim, and enlisted at Belfast (UK, Soldiers Died in the Great War, 1914-1919)
